item.title: Community Policy
item.description:
Community policy

If you are in my communities, please follow the below rules.

Last updated: %updated%.

General rules

These general rules are available in all comunities

Spam

The first rule to follow is to avoid spamming. Spamming is strictly prohibited, and if you engage in spamming, you will be warned. Continued spamming after receiving multiple warnings will result in consequences, the severity of which will depend on the specific circumstances.

item.title: All About Zola
item.description: Zola is a static site generator written in Rust language powered by Tera as its templating engine.

item.title: All About Cobalt
item.description: Cobalt is a static site generator written in Rust language powered by Liquid as its templating engine.

item.title: A New Chapter Begins
item.description: Hello everyone. This is the first blog post, and I wanted to share an update on my current situation.

item.title: About
item.description: About me

item.title: Accessibility
item.description:
Accessibility

I use the structure of the site clean and accessible as possible, especially with the visually impaired people. As I am a blind people, I implemented the accessibility of the site to be fully and responsive.

Headings

You can use Headings to navigate around each section. For example, each game is listed on each Heading at my Projects page.

Lists

You can use lists to navigate, for example, in navigation menu.

item.title: Config
item.description:
Site configuration

Here you can change the preferences for the site.

Time format

The time format is the format that will be used to display the date and time which you can find at the top of any page.

Visiter name for the site

The visiter's name is the name that will be used in name calling, such as in privacy policy section of greetings message at the top of any page.

item.title: Contact
item.description:
Contact

You can contact me with the following:

Telegram

This is the recommended option if you have it. Send me message at harrymkt.

Facebook Messenger

Although not much reliable as Telegram, you can still contact me on Messenger. Send me at harry.mk.64.

Email

Although email is unreliable, you can contact me at harrymk64@gmail.com.

Privacy Policy

At Harry Min Khant, I am committed to protecting your privacy. This privacy policy explains how I collect, use, and disclose personal information in connection with my technical support services, projects, and other offerings.
